thread.title: Cold weather shelter, ‘Come and be warm’ | Local News | chronicleonline.com
thread.title_full: Cold weather shelter, ‘Come and be warm’ | Local News | chronicleonline.com

author: Nancy Kennedy Chronicle Reporter
title: Cold weather shelter, ‘Come and be warm’ | Local News | chronicleonline.com
text: As 2023 ended, the Citrus County Cold Weather Shelter provided a warm place to sleep, plenty to eat and clothing to wear to 49 unduplicated participants (43 adults and six children), ages ranging from 8 months to 74. Almost 70 percent of the adults served reported having disabling conditions.
